languageKey.label: htmlArea RTE > Remove Format
The Remove Format feature offers options for cleaning up the HTML markup of the text being edited.
EXT:rtehtmlarea/extensions/RemoveFormat/skin/images/remove-format.gif
Remove format icon in the editor tool bar.
xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:options
Select the area to be cleaned
The format removal operation may be applied either to the currently highlighted text or to the whole contents of the editing area.
Use one of these two radio buttons to select the area to which you wish to apply the format removal operation.
Remove format on selected text only
Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the currently selected text only.
xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
Remove format on all contents
Select this option to perform the format removal operation on the whole contents of the editing area.
xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:area
Select the types of format to be removed
The format removal operation may remove various types of format.
Check one or more of these check boxes to select the type(s) of format you wish to be removed.

xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:htmlFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:msWordFormat,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:typographicalPunctuation,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:nonBreakingSpace,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:images,xEXT_rtehtmlarea_RemoveFormat:allHtml
Remove all HTML inline markup and style
Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML inline markup and style.
Remove all MS Word markup and style
Check this option if you wish to remove all MS Word markup and style.
Replace typographical punctuation
Check this option if you wish to replace typographical punctuation with ASCII character codes.
Replace non-breaking spaces
Check this option if you wish to replace non-breaking spaces with normal spaces.
This option replaces any non-breaking space with a simple normal space.
Remove images
Check this option if you wish to remove all images.
This option removes all images from the selected text.
Remove all HTML format
Check this option if you wish to remove all HTML format.
This option removes all HTML markup from the selected text.
